meanings.definition: To penalize by requiring payment of a sum of money.
meanings.sent1: He was fined for parking in the wrong spot.
meanings.sent2: The city fined him for littering in the park.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel was fined for stealing nuts from other animals.
meanings.sent4: The teacher fined the students for being late to class.
meanings.sent5: She was fined for not returning the library books on time.

meanings.definition: To clarify or purify by removing impurities.
meanings.sent1: The chef fined the broth by skimming off the foam.
meanings.sent2: She fined the water by filtering out the sediment.
meanings.sent3: The wizard fined the potion to make it crystal clear.
meanings.sent4: The jeweler fined the gold to make it shine brightly.
meanings.sent5: He fined the glass by removing any imperfections.
